reviewDetails.comment: Both my husband and I were extremely pleased with Dr. Wang. He is our son’s eye doctor and we find him to be knowledgeable, experienced, incisiveand good with kids and authentic
I always have a pleasant experience with Dr.Wang. He is very friendly, funny, and makes the appointments quick and easy.
It's always a pleasant visit to see Dr. Wang. He's great with children and very clear with providing details to parents in a way that is both professional and informative. Highly recommended.

schools.name: Univ Of South Florida Coll Of Med-Tampa

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Pothiawala has always listened to all of my concerns and addresses each one without rushing me through. She is very knowledgeable as to what is needed to resolve the issues (that can be resolved) with the first medication prescribed.

Great Dermatologist.
Will listen to your concerns and make sure you will have the right treatments.

I have no confidence in Dr Pothiawala. Two very dark spots developed on both knees over the past few months. Dr kept insisting that it was cause by friction. I showed her how impossible that was as both knees have a protruding bone which disables me from performing certain exercises due to pain. But she kept with the friction and giving her assistant a certain look. After I left it was then I realized that she was probably referring to a sexual position... I wish I'd thought of it while in her office as I am a single Christian and 7 years celibate.
Dr. Pothiawala was great at listening to my concerns and helping me find a solution.

I am not convinced as she Diane tell me much about my condition and simply suggested done tropical ointment. I visit her a year back and had similar experience and thought to try her once more but now I regret.

My experience was nothing short of awful. Dr. Pothiawala hardly spent any time with me (my total time there was <20 minutes). I was taken aback and upset about her questioning my skin problems. She filled prescriptions without explaining what they were. She attempted to immediately remove something from my skin as well. She stated "it'll leave a scar" in a threatening manner. There was zero explanation of anything and it was all very very rushed. 

Upon filling the prescriptions at my Pharmacy afterwards (and having to Google them myself to see what they even were)- I found that they were sent over with a misspelling of my last name and under the WRONG insurance. The office staff did not pay attention to detail (important details).

The entire experience at this office from start to finish was terrible.
Very thorough,  kind and detailed with explanation.  Prompt service and smiling faces when you are addressed.
